name: Battle Tiny
description:
Initially, I intend to make an interesting remake of Battle City with some new features and changes in the gameplay. However, due to lack of time, I still can not do it yet. This one can be considered as a mini version (or a demake) I made to attend #LowRezJam as well as #DemakeJam.

Battle Tiny is done within 10 days, using Godot Engine. I don't spend much time to test it, so it probably contains a lot of bugs. xD

Things already implemented

  • Main gameplay mechanic
  • Brand new low-rez graphics was made by me with Pico-8 color palette
  • Various sfx from completely free sources or made with Bfxr
  • 10 stages

Things I've planned but was not:

  • Power-up system
  • Other enemy tank types
  • Some game-feel effects
  • Music and better Sfx
